content.rendered:
Of brands and bargains

To win over Keralites, brand appeal matters.

The Grand Kerala Shopping Festival is when every brand vies for the shopper’s attention. Malayala Manorama wanted to tell brand managers and media planners that, to increase the brand appeal, all they had to do was team up with the leading daily.
